Package me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.types

Class FilterTypeBase<T,TData>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.types.FilterTypeBase<T,TData>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the root entity.
TData - The type of the data being filtered.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFilterType<T,TData>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigDecimalFilterType, BigIntegerFilterType, BooleanFilterType, ByteFilterType, CalendarFilterType, DateFilterType, DoubleFilterType, EnumFilterType, FloatFilterType, InstantFilterType, IntegerFilterType, LocalDateFilterType, LocalDateTimeFilterType, LocalTimeFilterType, LongFilterType, OffsetDateTimeFilterType, OffsetTimeFilterType, ShortFilterType, SqlDateFilterType, SqlTimeFilterType, SqlTimestampFilterType, TextFilterType, UuidFilterType, ZonedDateTimeFilterType
public abstract class FilterTypeBase<T,TData> extends Object implements IFilterType<T,TData>
FilterTypeBase is an abstract class that serves as a base for implementing custom filter types. It provides common functionality and methods for filter types.
